name: claude-marketplace
description: A collection of Claude Code metaskills for collaborative discovery, PRD creation, and skill building
author: Loren Lisk

commands.name: explore
commands.description: Collaborative discovery for new projects or features. Use when starting something new.

commands.name: create-prd
commands.description: Guides collaborative PRD creation from ideas of any fidelity. Use when starting a new feature, project, or spec.

commands.name: skill-builder
commands.description: Interview-driven skill/command generator for domain experts.

categories.discovery: Commands for exploring and understanding new projects
categories.planning: Commands for creating specifications and documentation
categories.meta: Commands that create other skills or commands
